column4: I can't say this for certain because I don't use Windows, but someone said here earlier that Wubi didn't work with 9.04. It may be that it don't work with 9.04 and Vista or 7 RC, but that's what I "heard" someone say.
but I can't install it separately either
How do you try to install it? And what happens when you try to install it? If you haven't, and you get to the install-menu of the live-CD, check the disc for defects.
Leszczoman, Halitech: I'll try some things over night and get in touch with you all tomorow, after work.
